Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.islands

Class IslandContainer

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.AutoCleanableAnchorPane
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.rescale.RescalableAnchorPane
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.islands.IslandContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
JavaFXRescalable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class IslandContainer extends RescalableAnchorPane
Class IslandContainer is the javaFX container for the Islands It manages their position in the main view and their arrangement in circles, and updates the number of visible islands depending on the table state
